site_title: Scottie Dog by Robert E. Neale

block_list.title: Video Tutorial
block_list.body: Learn how to fold this Easy Origami Dog. It's a Scottie, aka Scottish Terrier dog. This Origami Scottie is designed by Robert E. Neale. Really simple and really easy to fold. Try it out yourself. Learn it in less than a minute! Enjoy!!! Thanks For Watching! Wilson Lee @Heap Art

block_list.title: More Designs from Robert E. Neale
block_list.body:
• Modular Spinning Toy by Robert E. Neale
  • Penultimate Dodecahedron by Robert Neale
  • Scottie Dog by Robert E. Neale
